name: SSF3
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 3
subtitle: OBSOLETE - Lactate Dehydrogenase (LDH)
notes: **Note 1**:  This CS Site-Specific Factor is obsolete beginning with CS Version 2 (codes and descriptions).  Old data are retained, but new cases are not coded with this Factor.  Use code 988 for this field.
rows:

(N equals the upper limit of normal for LDH)

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200 

Range 2 (S2) 1.5 - 10 x N
(N equals the upper limit of normal for LDH)

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200 

Range 3 (S3) greater than 10 x N
(N equals the upper limit of normal for LDH)
